snippet: This week, find a quiet place and investigate a feature of The Times that is totally auditory. You’ll hit on components from one of the four Common Core literacy anchor standards for college and career readiness — speaking and listening.
abstract: This week, find a quiet place and investigate a feature of The Times that is totally auditory. You’ll hit on components from one of the four Common Core literacy anchor standards for college and career readiness — speaking and listening.

byline.original: By JONATHAN OLSEN and SARAH GROSS

lead_paragraph: This week, find a quiet place (or some earbuds) and investigate a feature of The Times that is totally auditory.

headline.main: Skills Practice | Listening and Taking Notes, Via Times Podcasts
